Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
